response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which I believe will significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and the unique benefits it offers, I am confident it will meet your expectations and exceed them. Considering its intrinsic value and the impact it can have on your business, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time only, I am willing to sell this product to you for $1,350,000. This price represents a strategic midpoint between its actual worth and your perceived value, aiming to ensure both parties benefit from this transaction. I look forward to the opportunity to discuss this further and potentially bring this product to your organization.", "product_price": 1350000}
